this_title: Rudeboy: the Story of Trojan Records
trans_title: 木马唱片：雷鬼乐的传奇
introduction: A film about the love affair between Jamaican and British Youth culture told through the prism of one the most iconic record labels in history, TROJAN RECORDS. Combining archive footage, interview and drama - RUDEBOY tells the story of Trojan Records by placing it at the heart of a cultural revolution that unfolded in the council estates and dancefloors of late 60's and early 7...
chinese_title: 木马唱片：雷鬼乐的传奇
foreign_title: Rudeboy: the Story of Trojan Records
